description: Try our easy to follow Rocket, Ricotta Cheese & Black Olive Dip recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Dip & spread,Pescatarian,Gluten free,Tree nut free,Egg free,Sesame free,Halal,Soy free,Wheat free,Vegetarian,Peanut free
name: Rocket, Ricotta Cheese & Black Olive Dip Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Put the wild rocket leaves, garlic, olives, lemon zest and juice, and oil in a blender or food processor, and whiz or blend until smooth.
Transfer the rocket and olive mixture to a bowl, add the ricotta cheese, and season with black pepper. Mix well.
Serve with torn chunks of warm sourdough bread, thick toasted slices of baguette, or grilled flatbread.
